casebody.data:
MYERS
v.
McGRADY and
McGrady
v.
Forrest. No. 391A04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 4, 2005. Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Solicitor-General, Raleigh, Robert T. Hargett, Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for N.C. Div. of Forrest Res., et al. Donald R. Strickland, Jerome P. Trehy, Jr., Raleigh, Dirk J. Derrick, Conway, SC, for Gail M. Myers. Steven M. Sartorio, Jamal A. Rhinehardt, Raleigh, for Shirley McGrady & Thomas Higgins. Rodney E. Petty, for Michael P. Murphy. F. Fincher Jarrell, Charlotte, for James Foust & William Spencer. Douglas F. Debank, for Verian Ladson. Charles L. Becton, Raleigh, for Interested Party.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of September 2005 by Plaintiff (Gail M. Myers) for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Gall M. Myers) shall have up to and including the 21st day of November 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court In conference this the 4th day of October 2005."
